title: Waters Announces June Committee Schedule
summary: Today, Congresswoman Maxine Waters (D-CA), Chairwoman of the House Committee on Financial Services, announced the following schedule for the month of June: Tuesday, June 14 at 10:00 AM ET (and subsequent days if necessary): The full Committee will convene for a hybrid markup. Wednesday, June 22 at 10:00 AM ET: The Subcommittee on Consumer Protection and Financial Institutions will convene for a hy...
